CALCULATE_DISTANCES_MODAL.TITLE: There are {X} locations!
CALCULATE_DISTANCES_MODAL.DESCRIPTION:
Calculating the distance between all the coordinates on your map can help you significantly!

Doing so will add a new section to your sidebar allowing you to check the distance and duration from one location to another, or which locations are close to another location you choose!

Beside that, two more useful feature you'll be exposed two are:
1. Traveling info will be added to your list view summary
2. Red indication and suggested leave time will be added to activities that are too close to each other
(based on calculated travel time)
SIDEBAR.DISTANCES_BLOCK.TITLE: Calculate Distance
